Package br.com.concepting.framework.controller.form.util

Class ActionFormValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.concepting.framework.controller.form.util.ActionFormValidator
  • public class ActionFormValidator
extends java.lang.Object
    Class responsible to validate a data model.

        Constructor - Initializes the validation.
        Type Parameters:
        F - Class that defines the form.
        Parameters:
        actionForm - Instance that contains the form.
        systemController - Instance that contains the system controller.
        actionFormController - Instance that contains the action form controller.
        securityController - Instance that contains the security controller.

        propertyValue - String that contains the value of the property.
        propertyPattern - String that contains the pattern of the property.

        comparePropertyCondition - Instance that contains the condition of comparison.
